scripts.bootstrap: pnpm --dir ./vite install & pnpm --dir ./astro install & pnpm --dir ./nuxt install & pnpm --dir ./vue-cli install & pnpm --dir ./farm install & pnpm --dir ./rsbuild install && pnpm --dir ./tailwindcss install
scripts.bump: pnpm bump:vite & pnpm bump:astro & pnpm bump:nuxt & pnpm bump:vue-cli & pnpm bump:rsbuild & pnpm bump:farm && pnpm bump:tailwindcss
